sourcesContent:
<script lang="ts">
import { Component, Vue } from "vue-property-decorator";

import { app_state_store } from "@/store";

@Component
export default class MenuBar extends Vue {
  private view_name = "";

  private role = "Role";

  created() {
    this.view_name = app_state_store.view_name;
    this.role = app_state_store.role;
    this.unsubscribe = this.$store.subscribe((mutation) => {
      if (mutation.type === "AppStateModule/setViewName") {
        this.view_name = app_state_store.view_name;
      }
      if (mutation.type === "AppStateModule/setRole") {
        this.role = app_state_store.role;
      }
    });
  }

  beforeDestroy() {
    this.unsubscribe();
  }
}

</script>

<template>
  <b-navbar type="dark" variant="dark">
    <b-navbar-brand>Grading Sheet</b-navbar-brand>
    <b-navbar-nav>
      <!-- Navbar dropdowns -->
      <b-nav-item-dd text="Menu">

        <b-dd-item v-if="role==='Instructor'" :to="{name: 'config'}">Configure Course</b-dd-item>
        <b-dd-item v-if="role==='Instructor'" :to="{name: 'instructor-grades'}">Grades</b-dd-item>
        <b-dd-item v-if="role==='Admin'" :to="{name: 'users'}">Users</b-dd-item>
      </b-nav-item-dd>
    </b-navbar-nav>
    <b-navbar-brand>{{view_name}}</b-navbar-brand>
    <b-navbar-nav class="ml-auto">
      <b-nav-text>{{role}}</b-nav-text>
      <b-nav-item-dd text="Select Role">
        <b-dd-item :to="{name: 'admin'}">Admin</b-dd-item>
        <b-dd-item :to="{name: 'Instructor'}">Instructor</b-dd-item>
        <b-dd-item :to="{name: 'student'}">Student</b-dd-item>
      </b-nav-item-dd>
    </b-navbar-nav>
  </b-navbar>
</template>
